title: Appletini Nicotine Pouches by Après
description: TRY APRÈS APPLETINI NICOTINE POUCHES Indulge in the irresistible pleasure of Appletini nicotine pouches by Après , immersing yourself in the captivating essence of freshly plucked apples. Get ready to embark on a flavorful adventure as each pouch unveils a perfectly balanced combination of sweet and sour notes, expertly crafted to capture the authentic essence of this beloved fruit. KEY FEATURES: Apple flavoured nicotine pouches Refreshing tingling sensation with each pouch 15mg nicotine strength (Strong) Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Discreet and suitable for all occasions Excellent nicotine experience MORE ABOUT APPLE FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Immerse yourself in the delightful realm of apple-flavored nicotine pouches and explore a world where each pouch expertly captures the essence of this beloved fruit. Experience a sensory journey that harmoniously blends the sweet, ripe apple notes with a subtle tanginess, resulting in a captivating flavor fusion that is both enticing and invigorating with every breath. MORE ABOUT APRÈS NICOTINE POUCHES Après is a distinguished brand from Stockholm that offers a truly premium experience. They take pride in creating all products and packaging using plant-based materials, ensuring a sustainable and eco-friendly approach. What sets Après apart is that their products are completely tobacco-free, offering a refreshing alternative. PACKAGE CONTENTS 20 x Après Appletini Nicotine Pouches Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Après Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Large Strength: Strong Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch): 15 MG Flavour Name: Appletini Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
